S: OK same as cancel (for stray events)
C: Cancel
specs call for AACTUALC<> 0 in where clause
but index is on AACTUALI
asuming that if ACTUALC <>0 then AACTUALI<>0 to improve performance
may be incorrect for low amounts with a large difference in rates then
theoretically one could be 0 while the other is not
Amount Actual = Factoring + Special
Varsets triggered by input
Init with totals build from selection, update in control suffix of relevant vars
check temp, if no records, build preselection?
problem: everything deselected -> rebuilds selection form scratch
have to do it only once .. has to be done from calling program
Invoice selected: verify and update temp
not/de selected
Previously selected Invoice deselected
incremental update faster than recalc from
Change on screen set start date
tax amount depends on mark code so always update
-- Test on TDCI_INVA_ACTAFACTORING + TDCI_INVA_ACTASPECIAL <> 0 to avoid
problem with devide by 0
